alert.note: Alert for Androscoggin; Cumberland; Kennebec; Sagadahoc; York (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 08 at 12:34PM EDT until August 08 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM EDT THIS AFTERNOON FOR SOUTHWESTERN KENNEBEC, NORTHWESTERN SAGADAHOC, ANDROSCOGGIN, CUMBERLAND AND NORTHEASTERN YORK COUNTIES... At 1234 PM EDT, Gauge reports indicated that heavy rain was falling across the warned area. Between 2 and 5 inches of rain have fallen across the warned area. Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 3 inches are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is ongoing. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by heavy rain. SOURCE...Gauges reported. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Portland, Lewiston, South Portland, Auburn, Biddeford, Brunswick, Augusta, Westbrook, Bath and Gardiner.This includes the I 95 and I 295 corridors. FLASH FLOOD...GAUGE INDICATED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
